start.text: I thought we're going to do this through diplomacy?!
Such a crude way to settle a dispute.
Atleast they're polite enough to kill us themselves rather than sending an assassin.
Don't put your hopes up on me commander.
War, my good man, is what happens when language fails.
Well that's diplomacy out of the window.
Hold your position, let me speak to their leader.

start_boss.text: I've heard of rumours, but THIS?.
OH. NO. YOU- YOU'RE NOT ACTUALLY TRYING TO FIGHT THEM ARE YOU?!
I can tell diplomacy won't work on them.

retreat.text: I'm falling back! To my cabin!.
Retreat? Retreat where, we're in space!
Retreat? So I just go the other way right?
Better than getting fried I guess.
Out of my league command, retreating.

out_of_missiles.text: Oooh so that's what the counter's are for.
We're out? Why haven't you told me sooner?
Welp, we're counting on you now gunnery officer.

engaged.text: Dulce bellum inexpertis, do you know what that means dear enemy?
And now the real battle begins.
Pirates, corporation, independent, or remnants. Makes no difference either way.
So quick to take another's life.
Of all the people I could fight, why you?
Okay, now, how does this works?.

need_help.text: My inexperience is starting to show!?
It appears they're more capable than I thought they'd be.
Council table's ain't got shit compared to this!

pursuing.text: A superbia initium sumpsit omnis perditio.
Wait hold on I'd like to speak with you! *Powers up weapons*
Engines full ahead! We need them!
I'd like to have a word with them.

running.text: Galatia taught me enough NOT to maintain this engagement! PULL BACK!

hull_90.text: So as I were saying this is Chicomoztoc made steel! nigh impenetrable I tell you- *Boom*

hull_50.text: Where are we at? WHAT? HALF?!
So that's half of the ship's gone.
'Second in command here, Captain's in their cabin sleeping away.'

hull_30.text: I'M A GOVERNMENT LEGISLATIVE, YOU SHAN'T KILL ME.
A DIPLOMAT ON THE FRONT? WHAT WAS I THINKING?!
My cabin! THEY TOOK OUT MY CABIN! KILL THEM ALL- *Clang* 'Second hand taking over'.

overload.text: Wha- why are these lights bleeping? [Crew whispers] Oh. WHAT?!
I've never personally piloted a combat ship! A shuttle sure but NOT THIS!
Damn lights almost gave me a heart attack!

death.text: I should've stayed in my office.
And so I am granted peace.

victory.text: In the end democracy wins the day.
